The department of health has reported 10 more COVID-19 related deaths in Northern Ireland, bringing the total to 309, according to Public Health Agency (PHA) statistics.
There have now been 3,374 confirmed positive cases.

articles.author: John Jeffay
articles.title: Scots nurse and dad of 13 in quarantine with entire family after catching coronavirus - Daily Record
articles.description: Roy Hann, a nurse practitioner at Dundee's Ninewells Hospital, is quarantined with wife Emma and 10 of their kids because there's not enough space to self-isolate at their five-bedroom home.
articles.content:
A dad of 13 kids has told how his whole household has to be quarantined after he was diagnosed with COVID-19.
Roy Hann, a nurse practitioner at Ninewells Hospital, Dundee, believes he picked up the infection at work.
Hes now got to stay inside, along with w… [+1741 chars]
